title: Flipped Learning-Based Advanced Practical Course for Analyzing Trends in Medical Education Research

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: A course strengthening corporate educational strategy development capabilities by analyzing medical education research trends, utilizing collaboration tools in a BYOD environment.

learning_goals: Learners can systematically classify the seven core research categories in medical education (technology application, learning outcome enhancement, etc.).
Using the flipped learning model, learners can write team-based research trend analysis reports and conduct peer reviews.
Referencing methodologies from high-frequency citation studies, learners can propose at least three improvement plans for in-house educational programs.

resources: Access to Medical Education Research Database

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
